name: shadowid-zk-circuits
description: Noir ZK circuits for ShadowID privacy-preserving identity verification system

scripts.build-all: node nargo.js compile age_proof && node nargo.js compile citizenship_proof && node nargo.js compile attribute_proof
scripts.test-all: node nargo.js test age_proof && node nargo.js test citizenship_proof && node nargo.js test attribute_proof

author: ShadowID Team
